SELECT SUM(sotien) as sotien,SUM(tongsotienlaitra) as tongsotienlaitra,SUM(tongsotienvontra) as tongsotienvontra FROM mb_lichsuthuphatchi where TRUE AND loai IN (3,4) AND createdate <= ? AND ((loai = 3 AND ngayxuly <= ?) OR (loai = 4 AND ngayxuly IS NULL)) AND phatvayid in (SELECT phatvayid from mb_phatvay where 1 = 1 and mactv = ? and ngayketthuc >= ? and createdate <= ? and phatvayid not in ( select phatvayid from mb_lichsuthuphatchi where trangThaiPhatVayHienTai in (2,3) and createdate <= ? ) )

select SUM(sotienvay) as sotienvay from mb_phatvay where TRUE and mactv = ? and ngayketthuc >= ? and createdate <= ? and phatvayid not in ( select phatvayid from mb_lichsuthuphatchi where trangThaiPhatVayHienTai in (2,3) and createdate <= ? )

SELECT ls.* FROM mb_lichsuthuphatchi ls INNER JOIN mb_phatvay pv ON ls.phatVayId = pv.phatVayId WHERE TRUE AND (ls.maCTV = ?) AND (ls.loai = ?) AND (ls.createDate <= ?) AND (ls.createDate >= ?) AND (ls.ngayXuLy <= ?) AND (ls.ngayXuLy >= ?) ORDER BY pv.soKU ASC,pv.createDate ASC

AND (ls.createDate <= ?) AND (ls.createDate >= ?) GROUP BY ls.loai,to_char(ls.ngayxuly,'dd/MM/yyyy') ORDER BY ls.loai ASC,to_char(ls.ngayxuly,'dd/MM/yyyy') ASC
